metadata.description: I'm passionate about software development, seeking exciting opportunities to start my professional career.

about.description: I'm passionate about software development, seeking exciting opportunities to start my professional career. Although I lack direct work experience, I have been dedicating time and effort to personal projects with the goal of enhancing my skills in both web development and design.

projectsDesc.0: Web application designed for organizing your daily tasks effectively
projectsDesc.1: Web calculator for helping you with mathematical operations. It has dark and light mode.
projectsDesc.2: Get some of the best advices with this web application.
projectsDesc.3: Small app for basic time tasks like watching the hour and creating timers.
